function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High rates of anxiety and depression during quarantines","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overreliance on digital health practices","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of sustainable integration of digital health practices","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid rollout of digital tools and packages in the medtech sector.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Switch from in-person to remote consultation methods in healthcare.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid navigation of governance and digital integration for digital care processes.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid education of healthcare workforce leading to potential gaps in knowledge and skills","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of digital health solutions for rapid redeployment education","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid development and implementation of new models of care supported by digital health innovation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased interaction and communication through social media platforms can lead to the rapid spread of misinformation about contagious diseases and their prevention.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The cancellation of educational activities, such as conferences and training courses, reduces opportunities for healthcare professionals to learn about new developments in disease prevention, diagnosis, and treatment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Highly infective disease with a range of symptoms, including respiratory failure or death","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need to triage and treat large numbers of patients with respiratory illness","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need to protect the healthcare workforce to ensure they are able to treat the sick","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cross-border movement of academics and professionals leading to potential spread of contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Financial interventions leading to economic instability and inequality","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of timely and accurate information leading to misinformation and panic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited dataset for covid-19 impact on mutual funds","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dynamic and evolving situation of covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of misrepresentation in financial research","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of the novel coronavirus","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dynamic evolution of the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transition from riskier to relatively safer options in investment strategies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transition of funds to utilities, wholesale, and retail firms during the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cumulative investment decline in germany and france due to coronavirus spread","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Preference of growth firms by equity funds and value investing by fixed income may lead to concentration of investment in specific sectors, increasing the risk of contagion within those sectors.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Concentration of social entrepreneurship funds in services and manufacturing sectors may lead to increased risk of contagion within these sectors.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Significant increase in investments in large firms by equity funds and corporate money market funds during turbulent periods may create concentration risk and increase vulnerability to contagious diseases within specific sectors.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Worsening market conditions impacting fund performance","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative risk-adjusted returns in phase 3 for treasury funds","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transition from positive to negative performance for equity funds in phases 2 and 3","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible contagion of diseases due to close contact in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative impact on health and well-being due to close contact in investment locations","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for disease transmission through shared spaces and surfaces in investment locations","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of sharpe ratio sensitive to market movements","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on var-based models without considering non-normality","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sensitivity of returns to different asset classes and investment strategies","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Financial market impact","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lockdown measures in eu member states","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for increased transmission of covid-19 within the eu due to investment fund activities and interactions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for public health risk in investment decision making","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Neglect of social responsibility in investment strategies during covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dynamic contagion of covid-19 across the european union","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Staggered overall response and financial speculation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on diverse range of funds in europe","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Investors using alternate options to park their funds due to economic deterioration","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Declining yields on treasury instruments due to extreme pressure on public finances from covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in fund returns reflecting the impact of systemic shocks like covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to consider viral epidemics as a significant risk","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scant evidence on economic and social impact of epidemics","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
